thread.title: Fantastic stay, beautiful hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic stay, beautiful hotel - Review of Mandarin Oriental, Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: SavannahMS24
title: Fantastic stay, beautiful hotel
text: My stay at the Mandarin Oriental throughout fashion week was seamlessly excellent. The staff were incredibly kind and attentive and went above and beyond to ensure my time at the hotel was enjoyable. Thank you for all of your efforts, I very much look forward to staying at the hotel again for my next stay in Paris. The mandarin oriental is a beautiful place to reside whilst spending time in the city.
